attributes.action: Legislate to ban the wearing of trousers by women in public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In many countries the wearing of trousers in public places, by women, is a criminal offence. 

The banning of women wearing trousers will bring this country into line with many other countries.

The wearing of trousers, in public, by women should carry a fixed penalty fine of £1000 for the first offence and unlimited fines coupled with unlimited terms of imprisonment on subsequent offences.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
